languages.text: "Как вы можете быть уверены, что никогда не ошибались? Не отбирали жизнь зря?"
"How do you know you have never made a mistake? How can you be sure you have never wrongly robbed one of your victims of their life?"
languages.original_text: "Как вы можете быть уверены, что никогда не ошибались? Не отбирали жизнь зря?"

traits.locale_text: "How can you be sure that you have never once made a mistake? That not one of your victims was wrongly robbed of their life?"
"How can you be sure that you have never once made a mistake? That not one of your victims was wrongly robbed of their life?"
"How do you know you have never made a mistake? How can you be sure you have never wrongly robbed one of your victims of their life?"
"How do you know you have never made a mistake? How can you be sure you have never wrongly robbed one of your victims of their life?"
"How do you know you have never made a mistake? How can you be sure you have never wrongly robbed one of your victims of their life?"
"How do you know you have never made a mistake? How can you be sure you have never wrongly robbed one of your victims of their life?"

languages.text: «¿Y cómo sabe que nunca ha cometido un error? ¿Cómo puede estar tan segura de que jamás le ha quitado la vida injustamente a alguna de sus víctimas?».
languages.original_text: "How do you know you have never made a mistake? How can you be sure you have never wrongly robbed one of your victims of their life?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Y cómo sabe que nunca ha cometido un error? ¿Cómo puede estar tan segura de que jamás le ha quitado la vida injustamente a alguna de sus víctimas?».

languages.text: 「どうして、一度も間違いを犯したことがないと言い切れる？なぜ、犠牲者の命を不当に奪ったことはないと言い切れるのだ？」
languages.original_text: "How do you know you have never made a mistake? How can you be sure you have never wrongly robbed one of your victims of their life?"

traits.locale_text: 「どうして、一度も間違いを犯したことがないと言い切れる？なぜ、犠牲者の命を不当に奪ったことはないと言い切れるのだ？」

languages.text: “你怎么知道你们从来没犯过错误？你怎么能肯定从来都没错杀过呢？”
languages.original_text: "How do you know you have never made a mistake? How can you be sure you have never wrongly robbed one of your victims of their life?"

traits.locale_text: “你怎么知道你们从来没犯过错误？你怎么能肯定从来都没错杀过呢？”

languages.text: "Woher wisst Ihr, dass Ihr nie einen Fehler gemacht habt? Wie könnt Ihr sicher sein, dass Ihr niemals eines Eurer Opfer fälschlicherweise seines Lebens beraubt habt?"
languages.original_text: "How do you know you have never made a mistake? How can you be sure you have never wrongly robbed one of your victims of their life?"

traits.locale_text: "Woher wisst Ihr, dass Ihr nie einen Fehler gemacht habt? Wie könnt Ihr sicher sein, dass Ihr niemals eines Eurer Opfer fälschlicherweise seines Lebens beraubt habt?"

languages.text: « Comment pouvez-vous être sûre de ne jamais vous être trompée ? De ne jamais avoir abrégé à tort l'existence de l'une de vos victimes ? »
languages.original_text: "How do you know you have never made a mistake? How can you be sure you have never wrongly robbed one of your victims of their life?"

traits.locale_text: « Comment pouvez-vous être sûre de ne jamais vous être trompée ? De ne jamais avoir abrégé à tort l'existence de l'une de vos victimes ? »

languages.text: "Hiç hata yapmadığını nereden biliyorsun? Kurbanlarından birinin canını kazara almadığından nasıl emin olabilirsin?"
languages.original_text: "How do you know you have never made a mistake? How can you be sure you have never wrongly robbed one of your victims of their life?"
